message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. This is a competitive price, considering the product's worth to you is $1500000. I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me is $1500000. I'm eager to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your desire to meet in the middle, but I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. Considering the product's value to you is $1500000, I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $1250000. This is a fair price, considering the value it will bring to your business. I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.
